content: with simple stitches and a sideways construction berie lets the tonal colorways of vintage handpaint shine ideal for a first shawl or first lace project for newer knitters berie is also perfect for tv knitting or taking on the go for the more experienced add warmth and a pop of color to any outfit with this quick-knit triangle shawl approximately 46 across top x 20 down center berroco vintage handpaint 218yrds/199m 3 5oz/100g #5208 raspberry cream - 2 hanks knitting needles size us 7 / 4 5mm gauge 19 sts x 32 row = 4 in garter stitch after blocking
